sign_up_label.question: You do not have an account yet?

failed_dialog.title: Error
failed_dialog.message: An error has occurred. Please try again later

user_waiting_for_approval.title: Pending admin approval
user_waiting_for_approval.body: An email was sent to the admin account notifiying your linked account. As soon as your account be validated we will send a notification and can login to the app, if there is any problem, you can send an email to:
user_waiting_for_approval.body_without_email: An email was sent to the admin account notifiying your linked account. As soon as your account be validated we will send a notification and can login to the app.

invalid.title: Invalid data
invalid.body: It is not possible to register this user because the fiscal data (NIF + Name) has not been found or do not match completely with the information registered in AEAT. You can check the data and try again or if you have any problem, you can send us an e-mail to

error.title: Can not continue
error.body: Due to a technical problem it is not possible to validate the user data. Please try again in a few minutes. If the problem persists, please send us an email to

validation.title: Email verification
validation.body: We have sent you an email to the address used for registration with a validation code. Enter the code below to proceed with registration. If you have any problem you can send us an email to

invalid_otp.title: Invalid code
invalid_otp.body: The code entered is invalid, try again..

required_fields.title: The marked fields with * are required

cif_nif.title: CIF/NIF/NRT
cif_nif.error: The entered NIF does not have a correct structure

requirements.password_length: The password must have at least 8 characters and contain:

change.title: Reset your password
change.body_1: Enter your email address below and we will send you an email with instructions on how to create a new password.

account_created.title: Do you already have an account?

error_dialog.title: Your account could not be created
error_dialog.body: Due to a technical problem we were unable to create your account. Please try again in a few minutes or send us an email to:

no_mail_dialog.title: New user
no_mail_dialog.body: An error occurred while creating the new user. We are unable to check the email address. To help you you can send us an email to

no_billable_dialog.title: E-mail already assigned
no_billable_dialog.body: The e-mail address you entered is already assigned to a customer with different data than the one you entered. You can cancel and try to enter the correct data, continue with the registration of a new customer or send us an email to

billable_dialog.title: E-mail already assigned
billable_dialog.body: The e-mail address you entered is assigned to a customer with different data than the one you entered. You can cancel and try to enter the correct data, continue with the registration of a new customer or send us an email to

tos_checkbox.title: By sending your data you accept the

user_already_registered_dialog.title: User already exists
user_already_registered_dialog.body: The data you have entered already exists in user management. Do you want to recover the password for this account? If you have problems you can contact us by sending us an e-mail to:
user_already_registered_dialog.body2: The data you have entered already exists in customer management. Do you want to link the user to existing data? If you have problems you can contact us by sending us an e-mail to:

user_unapproved_dialog.title: User not yet approved by administrator
user_unapproved_dialog.body: The data you have entered corresponds to a user that has not yet been approved by an administrator, contact the administrator or try again later.

dialog.title: Customer linking
dialog.description: An email has been sent to your account administrator so the linking can be confirmed. Once the link is made you will be able to access with your credentials. If you have problems you can contact us by sending us an e-mail at

password_recovery.title: Password Recovery
password_recovery.description: We have sent you an email to the address indicated with a validation code. Enter your new password and the code sent below to proceed with the password change. If you have any problems you can send us an email to

requirements.title: Password requirements
requirements.password_length: The password must have at least 8 characters and contain:

error.title: An error occurred changing the password

user_not_found.title: User not found
user_not_found.body: The user with email address can't be found, you can register as a user or check our support page sending an email to:

failed_dialog.title: Error
failed_dialog.message: Unable to communicate with the server, please restart the application.

dialog.login_guest_message: Some functions will be no available, to get access to all content, please log in with a registered account to access all features
dialog.creation_disabled_message_1: To continue with registration, please contact:
dialog.creation_disabled_message_2: In case you are already registered and want to link your account, click on the link option.

detail.title: Refund check
detail.description: Here is your refund check. You can use the coupon at our payment terminals.

empty.title: You don't have messages yet
empty.body: When you receive a message, they are going to appear here.

dialog.title: Delete message
dialog.body: Are you sure you want to delete your message? Once deleted you will not be able to recover it.

user_locked.title: User was locked
user_locked.body: The credentials used has been locked by admin, you could try to contact to administrator to be unlocked, also you can contact with support for more information and sending us an email to:

force_update.title: Mandatory Update
force_update.body: Please go to your smartphone store and update the application.

forgot_password_message: Please, for password changing get in contact with:
register_message: To proceed with register, please get in contact with:
login_to_use: Log in to use this feature
close_session_message: Are you sure you want to close the application?
invalid_credentials: Please enter valid email and password
guest_users: Log in to use this feature
no_search_results: No results for this search term
invalid_token_message: Invalid token, please log in with your credentials
logout_message: You're about to close your session, you will need to get logged in again to use all functions. Are you sure?
company_blocked: This company is out of service, please get in contact with:
no_server_connection: Server connection error, please try later. If the problem persists get in contact with:
no_internet_connection: Cannot connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
account_used: These credentials belong to one or more clients, please contact:
if_problem_persists: If the problem persists please get in contact with:
no_config_found: Sorry, there is no configuration for this company.
cannot_launch_url: Site is temporary unavailable, try again later.
no_results_search: There's no results for this search
card_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete your card?
card_delete_description: Deleting it means that you will not be able to use this card without adding it again.
empty_card_list_description_add: Use the button below to add cards.
empty_card_list_description: If you need to add a card you can contact:
no_gps: There is not a GPS functionality enabled
no_apps: It is not possible to open an application for

logout.title: Logout
logout.confirmation: Do you want to log out?
logout.confirmation_description: You are about to log out, you will have to log in again if you want to use all the features. Are you sure?

dialog.title: Delete your account
dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? You will not be able to log in again with your current credentials, although we will always be happy for you to register again. If you have any problem you can send us an email to

dialog.title: Your account couldn't be deleted
dialog.description: An error has been encountered deleting your account. If you have problems you can contact us by sending us an e-mail to:

dialog.title: Your account has been deleted successfully

purchases.title: My purchases
purchases.empty_purchases_content: When you start to buy, purchases going to be appear here!

filters.title: Filter by kind of search
filters.date_range_error: The date must be set in the calendar!

download_error.title: Download error
download_error.body: Due to a technical problem we were unable to download your document. Please try again in a few minutes or send us an email to

dialog.title: Application language change
dialog.body: To change the application language, it is going to restart and you will have to log in again.

modal_messages.email: The establishment's contact email address is
modal_messages.phone: The establishment's contact telephone number is

card_pin.text_enter_pin: Enter the security code of the card.
card_pin.pin_verified_message: The card will be added to favorites
card_pin.wrong_pin_message: PIN is wrong, If you have any issues, you can email us at:

banned.title: Card banned
banned.body: It is not possible to add this card because you have entered the PIN incorrectly too many times. You can try adding it again in
banned.body2: hour's. If you have any issues, you can email us at:

general_exceptions.message_bad_response: An error occurred while consulting the information. Try again.
general_exceptions.message_timeout: Could not contact the server. Try again.
general_exceptions.message_unknown: An error has occurred. Try again.

dialog.title: Do you want to log in?
dialog.body: In order to enjoy all the functions of this application you must log in. Do you want to go to the login?

dialog.title: Thanks for registering!
dialog.body: Your account has been created successfully.
